name: Clive vs. Hives
description:
Story

1000 years from now,  most of Earth has become uninhabitable. Humans now travel all over outer space and colonise planets far away. M.A.R-5, a division of a leading space research company called P.N.A.R (Post Nuclear Annihilation Rehabilitation) have their sights set on the planet Mars.

After an alien attack on a Mars research installation M.A.R-5 sends in volunteers from their Mars super-soldier program. M.A.R-5's super-soldiers have been engineered to breathe without atmosphere and adapt to changes in gravity, they form the perfect strike team for missions on alien planets.

Clive Cooper is one of those super-soldiers. He has been assigned the job of destroying the hives created by the dreaded aliens that live on Mars, the Nuffods.

But it may not be quite the planetary clean-out they predicted...

Gameplay

Control Agent Clive as he destroys the evil Nuffods. Use your M.A.R-5 brand anti-gravity pistol to wreak havoc on your enemies. Fight bosses and different enemy classes.

Note this game is in Early Access, it will receive updates in future.

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/Clive-vs-hives/428755
